Generation II.Gold: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a Spearow , it will violently shake its leaves.
Generation II.Silver: It lives by drinking only dewdrops from under the leaves of plants. It is said that it eats nothing else.
Generation II.Crystal: It is very weak. Its only means of defense is to shake its leaves desperately at its attacker.
